jopt.csp.spi.search.goal
Class StrictlyMinimizeGoal

java.lang.Object

      jopt.csp.spi.search.goal.StrictlyMinimizeGoal
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, jopt.csp.search.SearchGoal
Direct Known Subclasses:
MinimizeGoal
public class StrictlyMinimizeGoal
extends MinMaxSearchGoal

A goal for the strict minimization of an objective function. The goal is satisfied when a solution is found which has an objective value strictly less than the previous best solution.

Constructor Summary
StrictlyMinimizeGoal(jopt.csp.variable.CspVariableFactory varFact, ConstraintStore store, jopt.csp.variable.CspNumExpr expr, double stepSize, boolean isCurrentASolution)
          Creates a goal that will minimize a numeric expression
